mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_USER (mb, userName, userID, userEmail, userPassword, userBirthday, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, keyword4, keyword5) VALUES (#{mb}, #{userName}, #{userID}, #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userBirthday}, #{keyword1}, #{keyword2}, #{keyword3}, #{keyword4}, #{keyword5})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_USER SET mb = #{mb}, userPassword = #{userPassword}, keyword1 = #{keyword1}, keyword2 = #{keyword2}, keyword3 = #{keyword3}, keyword4 = #{keyword4}, keyword5 = #{keyword5} WHERE userID = #{userID}
mapper.select: select count(case when userID=#{userID} and userPassword=#{userPassword} then 1 end) FROM tbl_USER;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_USER WHERE userID = #{userID}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_USER WHERE userName = #{userName}
